subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the Philadelphia suburbs where Tim Donaghy grew up, there seems to be only muted sympathy for a man who was described by many as having an abrasive, confrontational personality.
snippet: In the Philadelphia suburbs where Tim Donaghy grew up, there seems to be only muted sympathy for a man who was described by many as having an abrasive, confrontational personality.
